Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Bland food! Veggies are few, salads are just lettuce and one tomato slice. Good for kids that like just plain pastas. Good service, indoor seating and located in a strip mall.

Review Text: I would totally give this place 5 stars for the food and service we received. I had the chicken Marsala and it was delicious. I had been really wanting something savory and comforting and it was the perfect choice. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Awesome üòé! Kids really liked it and they even tried some of the dishes they have been afraid to try in the past. I got the calzone and it was excellent!

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: This is an authentic Italian restaurant with great Italian food. It's nothing fancy, but just terrific food.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Great food, great service. Would eat here again. Too bad we live so far from Palm Springs.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Despite its name, it's a very good restaurant with authentic Italian cooking.  The owner is from Florence, Italy and takes pride in the food she serves.  The pizza is very good and is made with fresh ingredients that come through in its flavor and taste.  Worth a visit.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: We really enjoyed our experience here. They are very Covid compliant. We needed to have a mask on and our covid cards were verified with our ID. ‚Ä¶

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Great food, great service. Would eat here again. Too bad we live so far from Palm Springs.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: The best pizza in Palm Springs hands down! This is where you go for authentic Italian, not bland chain restaurant fair or flavorless haute cuisine. This is the real deal!

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Best meal I had in Palm Springs! If you‚Äôre looking for a hearty and comfort food, this is the place for you. Authentic home made food made from scratch and the service is top notch. Definitely coming back every time I‚Äôm in Palm Springs. Very good price as well!

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: This is an authentic Italian restaurant with great Italian food. It's nothing fancy, but just terrific food.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: What a wonderful hidden gem in Palm Springs! This family owned restaurant has been around for 38 years! The family who runs this restaurant treats its customers like family. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: My boyfriend and I just ordered shrimp alfredo and did not get the shrimp...along with lasagna, and it was extremely greasy, everything was bland. Very unsatisfied.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: I really wanted to like this place, I had high expectation from the previous reviews. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Very friendly staff. Quick service. Big plates. Just what you want when you have spent the day hiking and you are hungry.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: I‚Äôm from Connecticut (Home of the Pizza Capitol of the world, New Haven, CT according to Dave Portnoy) so I‚Äôve been lucky to have good slices of pizza in my life. And for having such a high standard for pizza I would say this place has my ‚Ä¶

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: The pastas that we had here were really authentic! The flavors reminded us of the food in Italy. I had the meat and mushroom bolognese which had that rich slow cooked flavor. Hubby had the carbonara which was creamy and rich but so ‚Ä¶

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: I came here because of the good reviews and they are 100% deserved. I absolutely loved the service and the food. My wife and I will come here every time we visit Palm Springs. Highly recommended!!

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: The best. Family owned with love pouring out in the service they give. Great food. The pizza was like we were back in Italy.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Very average food. The insalata mista is a standard green salad with iceberg lettuce, onions, tomatoes, canned olives and packaged artichokes - I was expecting mixed... radicchio, endive, maybe some shaved parm. The cannoli was overly sweet ‚Ä¶

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text:
Burnt pizza, Carbonara terrible
Salad dressing very good , but the actual Salad was all core pieces of the iceberg lettuce, it was  just the throw away pieces that were in my portion.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: The waitstaff are nice and friendly and did not take long for the food

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Service was excellent. The pizza we ordered was a thin crust and was wonderful. The wine was very good. This is what my wife and I enjoy most at Spaghetteria.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Uninspired menu.  My partner's baked rigatoni was a gloppy mess.  My ravioli Bolognese was greasy and served tepid, although the plate was hot.  (Microwave?) Both meals were overpriced for as mundane as they were.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: We paid $50 to have two entrees delivered less than a mile away from the restaurant no silverware no plastic forks even no seasoning my pasta was oily and Bland

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: The food is made fresh! You can taste the different flavors.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Delicious and a must go for those who love Italian food!

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: The Best Italian Restaurant in the Palm Springs, Exelent, Very friendly Service & testy foods

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Simply THE BEST PEPPERONI PIZZA period! Definitely as good as anything available in Brooklyn, the official ground zero for pizza. The lady owner is a rare gem. So very pleasant and accommodating.  First time ordered through UberEats. Seamless, reliable experience.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Great Italian food crafted  by a family passionate for delicious creations!

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: I really love their penne arrabbiata and can‚Äôt wait to try more of what they have. Pamela is really nice and cares for her customers. She delivered to the curb side faster than a drive thru. Such yummy food, friendly and fast service. Thank you again! And yes, they accept credit cards.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: We were just in Palm Springs this weekend and the group we went with wanted to have Italian food for dinner. After looking up a variety of local restaurants we decided to give Spaghetteria a try, and I'm so glad we did because we were not ‚Ä¶

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Cannot say enough for this family owned Pizzeria. If you are looking for a Pizza in the Palm Springs area you NEED to go to Spaghetteria. All ingredients are home made, service was terrific and the Wine at $ 5.70 a glass was worth having ‚Ä¶

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Amazing food and service. It felt like I was in Italy for a second the food, the atmosphere all so Italian. The owner is super friendly and the food is awesome. I would gladly go back regularly if I did not live in Orange County. Do your ‚Ä¶

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: I very highly recommend this family owned restaurant. The service was above and beyond-- friendly, helpful, and quick. Everything from appetizers to spaghetti to pizza to desserts was fantastic. This is right up there with the Italian places in Little Italy, NYC. Everything felt homemade.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: We were in town for the weekend and wanted some Italian food and came across this little gem! Not only was the food delicious,  Pamela, the owner,  was super friendly and welcoming. We will definitely be back. I highly recommend this restaurant. I wish Pamela had a location in OC.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Small Italian place owned by family from the Tuscan area. Very pleasant nice atmosphere, food was good, how can you go wrong with Italian! LOL. The waitress we had is the owner and we met her brother as well. They were very busy and our ‚Ä¶

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Our go to spot when we're in the area!

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: From out of town and found this cute little Italian restaurant. Nothing fancy, but the food is amazing. Garlic bread was so fresh. Sauce is so delicious. Stuffed shells were awesome Super friendly waitress.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Such a great place! Food was excellent, very reasonably priced and the service was impeccable. Our server went above and beyond and was so kind. Everything tasted amazing, and we cannot wait to return. Family owned places are always the best!

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Staff friendly... however the meal I had received a solid "C". I am always suspicious when you place your order and it arrives 5 minutes later.. I ordered a pesto dish that was far to greasy, with noodles that were over cooked. There was no bread on the table. Overall very mediocre..

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Great place. I have been coming here since I was a little boy. It's great every time. Lovely staff and great food. Pizza is to die for.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: The best authentic Italian food in the valley. Straight from Italy,  these folks have been serving up family favorites for years. Momma and Poppa and their 2 grown daughters serve the most delicious flavorful Italian food within 100 miles. ‚Ä¶

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: We‚Äôre here for the weekend and had no idea where to go for dinner. We found this restaurant by luck. It was THE BEST! Pamela, the owner was very kind. The food was authentic and just the right amount and prices were great! We‚Äôll definitely be back!

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Loved the food! Family owned restaurant, with pride in what they do. All pizzas are amazing, and most of all we loved the eggplant sandwich where even the bread is baked onsite. We were a group of 8 and were treated very nice with patience and attention, no need to look for waitress - she was on the watch ready to support at all time.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: Family owned and authentic. Vegie calzone is delicious and fresh

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: The best Pizza in the valley!! This family/owners have been in the Italian food business for years.  They are from Florence Italy and still maintain a residence there.  They know what they are doing. Using the best quality ingredients, the food is authentic and delicious.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: THE BEST AUTHENTIC ITALIAN FOOD in This entire DESERT !  SERVICE. And Owners Terrific. Spoke to your Grand daughter who I remember in a baby stroller IM sorry I don't get into Palm Springs more often.. Bella mi amore.  Bobbie

Review Text: Went a few nights ago with some friends and everyone absolutely loved the food. The spaghetti and meatballs were perfect. My friend had the Bolognese sauce and loved it. My two other friends had the eggplant Parmesan and thought it was very good. The desserts were great.

Name: Spaghetteria Pasta Bar
Review Text: How could you not love anything this Family makes in the kitchen.  Palm Springs Finest.
